entry.title: RT Nilesh 🪐: We launched @orbwagmi at N&W S1, and so many crazy things happened afterward. We(a team of three) ended up doing it full-time, and tho...
entry.summary: RT Nilesh 🪐 We launched @orbwagmi at N&W S1, and so many crazy things happened afterward. We(a team of three) ended up doing it full-time, and thousands of users use the app every day. This is a perfect place where you can make your product go 0 to 1 in just 6 weeks. 1-day left to apply. Farza 🇺🇸 🇵🇰: We're running Nights & Weekends S2. It's a 6-week sprint where you'll join 500 other builders and: pick an idea, build it out, ship it, and get real users. At the end, we invite everyone out IRL to SF to build at @fdotinc for 3-days 1-day left, apply: https://buildspace.so/nights-weekends

entry.title: RT Erik Knobl: Building good stuff. The team of our awesome @jazza_eth from @developer_dao is shipping!
entry.summary: RT Erik Knobl Building good stuff. The team of our awesome @jazza_eth from @developer_dao is shipping! 3RM: Web3 is tired of Telegram. • It's impossible to keep track of chats • It's annoying to invite your teammates to new chats • Sharing info about conversations with your team is all manual work Until now. We've built a Telegram CRM, and here's why you'll love it 👇
